column1: How do i create an account?  Click the Sign Up button on top right corner of our homepage and fill your details.
What courses do you offer?  we offer training for Microsoft Certifications such as AZ-900,AZ-104,DP-600 AZ-305,AI-900,as well as AWS Certifications.
I forgot my password. What should i do ?  Click on "Forgot Password?" on the login page to reset your password.
Do you provide free trial lessons?  Yes, we provide a free preview of selected lessons before you purchase a course.
What payment methods do you accept?   We accept  credit cards, debit cars, and PayPal.
How can i purchase a course?  Select the course you want , click Buy Now, and follow the payment process.
Do you provide certificates after course completion?   Yes, we do provide a certificate once u complete the full course.
Can I download the course videos?   No, but you can stream them online anythime.

Can you provide details on corporate pricing options?  Yes, InnovativeTech offers flexible corporate training packages. Pricing depends on the number of learners and the courses include. Discounts are available for larger teams. To get customized quote, please contact our sales team at innovatetech@gmail.com
